resources.string: In NORMAL mode, the script is available to read with no hidden text, and stats are not recorded. \n\nIn REHEARSAL mode, the selected character\'s lines will be hidden, and stats will be recorded.
Cue Words will underline relevent words from the previous line delivered by another character, to help you remember the context of yor current line.
Breaking up the text will split each line by sentence. When pressing \"Next\", instead of revealing the whole line, you will only reveal the next sentence. \n\n Not available in NORMAL mode.
Here you will only display the lines delivered by your selected character. \n\n Not available in REHEARSAL mode.
Toggling this will either hide or show the stage directions.
